column2: "/ci1 1 You spoke as easily as if you were inviting them to tea. Is joining battle really such a casual affair here...?"
"/ci2 1 My thanks for your cooperation. This is a wonderfully scenic location. I hope that when we return, we can enjoy it at a more reasonable pace."

"How could this have happened...!
Perhaps my skin being more exposed than I am used to caused me to hesitate..."
"Worry not. We shall take care of the rest."
